steps.text: Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 9
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 7
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 2
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 10
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 4
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 8
Uninstall thermal cover by detaching flap 6
Demate Connector J1 (PRIMARY POWER)
Demate Connector J2 (Secondary POWER)
Demate Connector J3 (1553 Ch. A)
Demate Connector J4 (1553 Ch. B)
Drive Dual Latch fastener 26 to SAW LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Drive Dual Latch fastener H3 to SAW LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Drive Dual Latch fastener H4 to SAW LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Unfasten housing fastener H6 (10-12 turns)
Unfasten housing fastener H7 (10-12 turns)
Unfasten housing fastener H8 (10-12 turns)
Unfasten housing fastener H9 (10-12 turns)
Unfasten vise clamp bolt H5 (18-20 turns)
Unfasten Center Fastener H1 (zip nut)
Fasten Center Fastener H1 (zip nut)
Fasten Vise Clamp bolt H5 (18-20 turns)
Fasten housing fastener H6 (10-12 turns)
Fasten housing fastener H7 (10-12 turns)
Fasten housing fastener H8 (10-12 turns)
Fasten housing fastener H9 (10-12 turns)
Fasten Dual Latch fastener H2 to BMRRM LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Fasten Dual Latch fastener H3 to BMRRM LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Fasten Dual Latch fastener H4 to BMRRM LATCH position (21-25 turns)
Mate Connector J4 (1553 Ch. B)
Mate Connector J3 (1553 Ch. A)
Mate Connector J2 (Secondary POWER)
Mate Connector J1 (PRIMARY POWER)
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 6
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 8
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 4
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 10
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 2
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 7
Install thermal cover by reattaching flap 9
